# Media Magic [![](https://img.shields.io/github/license/rafay-pk/media-magic)](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/) [![Discord Shield](https://discordapp.com/api/guilds/1011521934409879614/widget.png?style=shield)](https://discord.gg/s2Trxem4XE)

A Cross-Platform Media Viewing, Managing, Tagging and Searching Application made in Unity
